class Solution {
static int INTMAX = 0x3f3f3f3f;

/* BFS */public int networkDelayTime(int[][] times, int n, int k) {    // å»ºå›¾ - é‚»æ¥è¡¨    Map<Integer, Map<Integer, Integer>> mp = new HashMap<>();    for (int[] edg : times) {        if (!mp.containsKey(edg[0]))            mp.put(edg[0], new HashMap<>());        mp.get(edg[0]).put(edg[1], edg[2]);    }    // è®°å½•ç»“ç‚¹æœ€æ—©æ”¶åˆ°ä¿¡å·çš„æ—¶é—´     int[] r = new int[n + 1];    for (int i = 1; i <= n; ++i)        r[i] = INTMAX;    r[k] = 0;    // é˜Ÿåˆ—ä¸­å­˜æ”¾ [ç»“ç‚¹ï¼Œæ”¶åˆ°ä¿¡å·æ—¶é—´]    Deque<int[]> s = new ArrayDeque<>();    s.addLast(new int[] { k, 0 });    while (!s.isEmpty()) {        int[] cur = s.pollFirst();        if (mp.containsKey(cur[0])) {            for (int v : mp.get(cur[0]).keySet()) {                int t = mp.get(cur[0]).get(v) + cur[1];                if (t < r[v]) {                    r[v] = t;                    s.addLast(new int[] { v, t });                }            }        }    }    int minT = -1;    for (int i = 1; i <= n; ++i)        minT = Math.max(minT, r[i]);    return minT == INTMAX ? -1 : minT;}

}
